page.title: 18Wallingford. Western Edge.
page.content: The Western edge of {Wallingford} is a mixture of residential and industrial buildings. Popular housing is found along the Wantage Road and on Fir Tree Estate and around Sinodun Road. The Parish of Brightwell extends to Queen's Avenue, just into the edge of the town. {Habitat} The designer furnishing firm has its Headquarters and Warehouse on the Walingford Industrial Estate. From here its shops all over the country are served. {ABM Maltings} is said to be of the largest plants of its kind in the country is also to be found on the Industrial estate. {Wallingford and Cholsey Railway.} The railway was closed to passenger traffic many years ago, but was kept open for industrial traffic. It has now been taken over by a preservation society who intend to reopen it for passengers.
